sentence.Network_en: Then he destroyed all comers in the Belmont to snatch the Triple Crown.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后他在贝尔蒙中击退了所有参赛者,夺取了三冠.

sentence.Network_en: Williams won Triple Crown twice, and was inducted into Hall of Fame in 1966.
sentence.Network_cn: 威廉斯曾两度荣获三冠王, 并于一九六六年入主名人堂.

sentence.Network_en: She says the sovereignty of the Crown must be preserved.
sentence.Network_cn: 她说必须维护王国政府的主权。

list.abs: 马赛三冠王（Triple Crown），果然是难以实现的目标；普瑞克聂斯大赛马18日举行，最被看好的热门Orb未能夺冠，Oxbow一马当先 …
看欧洲杯学英文_长弓飞莺_新浪博客 ... defending champion 卫冕冠军 triple crown 三连冠 runner-up 亚军.

means.word_mean: 1. of a horse that has won the Kentucky Derby and the Belmont Stakes and the Preakness Stakes races
2. unofficial championship title for player who heads the league in batting average and home runs and runs batted in
